actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Theresa Flowers.

summary.text: Declares: (1) that a named individual shall be considered to have died on a specified date, for purposes of determining the eligibility of another named individual to a survivor annuity from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund; and (2) that any amounts so payable shall be in satisfaction of specified claims of such individual against the United States.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Theresa Flowers.
